text: BLF may refer to: * Bangladesh Liberation Front, also called Mujib Bahini * Baluch Liberation Front * Billboard Liberation Front * British Lung Foundation * Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen, forerunner of the Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen in North America * Bruce Lee Foundation * Builders Labourers Federation in Australia * Mercer County Airport (West Virginia); IATA airport code BLF * Buol language of Indonesia (ISO code: blf) * Black First Land First a pan-Africanist and revolutionary socialist political party in South Africa * Blf, short for "Bluff"; a Street suffix as used in the US
title: BLF
